tool_description: Validates extracted product data for completeness, accuracy, and consistency according to predefined rules and data quality standards.

product_data.description: Product data in JSON format to validate

validate_prices.description: Whether to validate price format and reasonableness

error_messages: Invalid JSON format: Product data must be valid JSON
Missing required fields: One or more required fields are missing from the data
Invalid price values: Price values are outside acceptable range or incorrectly formatted
Invalid URL format: One or more URLs are not properly formatted
Data validation failed: Data does not meet specified quality standards
usage: Provide product data in JSON format along with validation criteria. The tool checks data completeness, format validity, and value constraints.

is_valid.description: Whether the data passes all validation checks
